name: Keep Dark
description: This is a style for Google Keep. I collapsed all the cards so that the user is able to see more cards on the page at once. Hover over a card to view the full contents. This is a work in progress. Please donate, it helps me to continue to make more styles.

user.name: Jessica Gardner
user.about:
I am a UI/UX Designer. I specialize in updating outdated user interfaces as well as designing new ones. I focus on the usability and user interaction aspect of design which you will soon see as I upload some of my work. I design best with HTML, CSS, CSS3, jQuery. I also work well in JavaScript and AngularJS

I live in St. Louis MO, I am open to do website design or web app design remotely. I am also able to design desktop applications using WPF
